itemInfo.itemDesc: Immediately heals MP/WP/SP by +125.\n- Cooldown: 6 sec\n- It weighs less than normal potion.

item.name: Weeds
item.desc: It’s just a useless weed. You can sell it for a cheap price to merchants.

item.name: Mineral Water
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vendor or Innkeeper.\n\n※ Using Mineral Water on a Garden will slightly increase the amount of available Water Deposit.

item.name: Sunrise Herb
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Cron Castle Site and Balenos Forest. It can also be Gathered directly from Wild Herbs using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!

item.name: Mineral Water
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vendor or Innkeeper.\n\n※ Using Mineral Water on a Garden will slightly increase the amount of available Water Deposit.

item.name: Silver Azalea
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at the Northern Plain of Serendia and Lynch Farm Ruins. It can also be Gathered directly from Wild Herbs using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!

item.name: Mineral Water
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vendor or Innkeeper.\n\n※ Using Mineral Water on a Garden will slightly increase the amount of available Water Deposit.

item.desc:

item.name: Silk Honey Grass
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Karanda Ridge, Longleaf Tree Sentry Post, Ancient Fissure, and Marni’s 2nd Lab. It can also be Gathered directly from Wild Herbs using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!

item.name: Mineral Water
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vendor or Innkeeper.\n\n※ Using Mineral Water on a Garden will slightly increase the amount of available Water Deposit.

item.name: Everlasting Herb
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy. Everlasting Herbs require a certain level of skill to collect.
- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered directly from Wild Herbs using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!

item.name: Mineral Water
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vendor or Innkeeper.\n\n※ Using Mineral Water on a Garden will slightly increase the amount of available Water Deposit.

item.name: Wild Grass
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from Wild Herbs using Barehanded Gathering.

item.name: Mineral Water
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vendor or Innkeeper.\n\n※ Using Mineral Water on a Garden will slightly increase the amount of available Water Deposit.

item.name: High-Quality Sunrise Herb
item.desc:
A Farming product that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.
- How to Obtain: Seeds can be obtained through Plant Breeding in a Garden.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!
